[21] ``channā ^a^V0.0162^ea^ me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā, vassa deva yathāsukhaṃ.
[22] cittaṃ me susamāhitaṃ vimuttaṃ, ātāpī viharāmi vassa devā''ti..
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ {itthaṃ sumaṃ (ka0 aṭṭha0)} āyasmā subhūtitthero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko {mahākoṭṭhito (sī0 syā0)} thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``paññaṃ ^a^T0.0261^ea^ ^a^P0.0002^ea^ imaṃ passa tathāgatānaṃ, aggi yathā pajjalito nisīthe.
[22] ālokadā cakkhudadā bhavanti, ye āgatānaṃ vinayanti kaṅkha''nti..
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā kaṅkhārevato thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[27] atthaṃ mahantaṃ gambhīraṃ, duddasaṃ nipuṇaṃ aṇuṃ.
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā puṇṇo mantāṇiputto {mantāniputto (syā0 ka0)} thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``yo ^a^V0.0163^ea^ duddamiyo damena danto, dabbo santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho.
[22] vijitāvī apetabheravo hi, dabbo so parinibbuto ṭhitatto''ti..
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā dabbo thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``yo ^a^M0.0221^ea^ sītavanaṃ upagā bhikkhu, eko santusito samāhitatto.
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā sītavaniyo thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[22] vijitāvī apetabheravo hi, danto so parinibbuto ṭhitatto''ti..
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā bhalliyo thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``yo duddamiyo damena danto, vīro santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho.
[22] vijitāvī apetalomahaṃso, vīro so parinibbuto ṭhitatto''ti..
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā vīro thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``svāgataṃ na durāgataṃ {nāpagataṃ (sī0 syā0)}, nayidaṃ dumantitaṃ mama.
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā pilindavaccho {pilindivaccho (sī0)} thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``vihari ^a^M0.0222^ea^ ^a^V0.0164^ea^ ^a^P0.0003^ea^ apekkhaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā, yo vedaūū samito yatatto.
[22] sabbesu dhammesu anūpalitto, lokassa jaññā udayabbayañcā''ti..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā puṇṇamāso thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
[27] mantāṇiputto dabbo ca, sītavaniyo ca bhalliyo.
[22] yadatthiyaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjamāno, kaṅkhetha kālaṃ idha vītarāgo''ti..
[27] gāme ^a^T0.0264^ea^ me vasati kāyo, araññaṃ me gato mano.
[21] ``pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye.
[21] ``middhī ^a^P0.0004^ea^ yadā hoti mahagghaso ca, niddāyitā samparivattasāyī.
[27] kevalaṃ aṭṭhisaññāya, apharī pathaviṃ {paṭhaviṃ (sī0 syā0)} imaṃ.
[22] maññehaṃ kāmarāgaṃ so, khippameva pahissatī''ti {pahīyabhi (sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ)}..
[21] {dha0 pa0 80, 145 dhammapadepi} ``udakaṃ ^a^V0.0166^ea^ hi nayanti nettikā, usukārā namayanti {damayanti (ka0)} tejanaṃ.
[22] dāruṃ ^a^T0.0265^ea^ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti subbatā''ti..
[21] ``maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, nikanti natthi jīvite.
[27] kuṇḍadhāno ca belaṭṭhi, dāsako ca tatopari.
[22] siṅgālapitiko thero, kulo ca ajito dasāti..
[21] ``nāhaṃ bhayassa bhāyāmi, satthā no amatassa kovido.
[22] yattha bhayaṃ nāvatiṭṭhati, tena maggena vajanti bhikkhavo''ti..
[21] ``nīlā ^a^M0.0225^ea^ sugīvā sikhino, morā kārambhiyaṃ {kāraṃviyaṃ (sī0), kāraviyaṃ (syā0)} abhinadanti.
[22] te sītavātakīḷitā {sītavātakadditakalitā (sī0), sītavātakalitā (syā0)}, suttaṃ jhāyaṃ {jhānaṃ (syā0), jhāyiṃ (?)} nibodhentī''ti..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..
[22] paccabyadhiṃ hi nipuṇaṃ, vālaggaṃ usunā yathā''ti..
[22] kacci sīlamayaṃ gandhaṃ, kiṃ tvaṃ vāyasi {kacci sīlamayaṃ gandhaṃ, tvaṃ vāsi (syā0)} netarā pajā''ti..
[22] cittaṃ ^a^T0.0267^ea^ ujuṃ karitvāna, avijjaṃ bhinda hāritā''ti..
[22] ābādho me samuppanno, kālo me nappamajjitu''nti..
[22] nimiyaṃ {nimmissaṃ (sī0), nirāmisaṃ (syā0), nimineyyaṃ (?)} paramaṃ santiṃ, yogakkhemaṃ anuttara''nti..
[22] evaṃ sabbesu pāṇesu, sabbattha kusalo siyā''ti..
[21] ``sukhaṃ sukhattho labhate tadācaraṃ, kittiñca pappoti yasassa vaḍḍhati.
[22] yo ariyamaṭṭhaṅgikamañjasaṃ ujuṃ, bhāveti maggaṃ amatassa pattiyā''ti..
[21] ``sādhu ^a^M0.0228^ea^ sutaṃ sādhu caritakaṃ, sādhu sadā aniketavihāro.
[21] ``yo ^a^T0.0269^ea^ ^a^V0.0170^ea^ iddhiyā sarabhuṃ aṭṭhapesi, so gavampati asito anejo.
[22] taṃ sabbasaṅgātigataṃ mahāmuniṃ, devā namassanti bhavassa pāragu''nti..
[22] nagavivaragato ca jhāyati, putto appaṭimassa tādino''ti..
[21] ``cāle ^a^V0.0171^ea^ upacāle sīsūpacāle ( ) {(cālā upacālā, sīsūpacālā) (ka0)} patissatā {paṭissatikā (syā0 ka0)} nu kho viharatha.
[22] asitāsu mayā naṅgalāsu, mayā khuddakuddālāsu mayā..
[21] yadipi idhameva idhameva, atha vāpi alameva alameva.
[22] jhāya sumaṅgala jhāya sumaṅgala, appamatto vihara sumaṅgalā''ti..
[21] {saṃ0 ni0 1.239} ``mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati.
[22] jīvantaṃ maṃ amma passantī, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī''ti..
[27] ^b^sati paññā^eb^ ca me vuḍḍhā, cittañca susamāhitaṃ.
[22] kāmaṃ karassu rūpāni, neva maṃ byādhayissasī''ti {bādhayissasīti (sī0), byāthayissasīti (?)}..
[22] na me taṃ phandati cittaṃ, ekattanirataṃ hi me''ti..
[21] ``dharaṇī ^a^M0.0231^ea^ ca siñcati vāti, māluto vijjutā carati nabhe.
[22] rāmaṇeyyo ca so thero, vimalo ca raṇañjahoti..
[21] ``vassati ^a^V0.0173^ea^ devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā.
[22] cittaṃ susamāhitañca mayhaṃ, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā''ti..
[21] ``vassati devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā.
[22] ^b^cittaṃ susamāhitañca kāye,^eb^ atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā''ti..
[21] ``vassati devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā.
[22] tassaṃ viharāmi appamatto, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā''ti..
[21] ``vassati ^a^M0.0232^ea^ ^a^P0.0009^ea^ devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā.
[22] tassaṃ viharāmi adutiyo, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā''ti..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..
[22] evaṃ jānāhi āvuso, amoghā te kuṭikā katā''ti..
[21] ``ayamāhu purāṇiyā kuṭi, aññaṃ patthayase navaṃ kuṭiṃ.
[22] āsaṃ kuṭiyā virājaya, dukkhā bhikkhu puna navā kuṭī''ti..
[22] na me attho kumārīhi, yesaṃ attho tahiṃ gacchatha nāriyo''ti..
[21] ``te me ijjhiṃsu saṅkappā, yadattho pāvisiṃ kuṭiṃ.
[21] godhiko ^a^T0.0274^ea^ ca subāhu ca, valliyo uttiyo isi.
[21] ``ekakā ^a^P0.0010^ea^ mayaṃ araññe viharāma, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ.
[22] tassa me bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina''nti..
[22] kataṃ kiccaṃ rataṃ rammaṃ, sukhenanvāgataṃ sukha''nti..
[27] tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvāna, vihāsiṃ santike sato.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..
[22] sokā na bhavanti tādino, upasantassa sadā satīmato''ti..
[22] maggaṃ papajjiṃ {papajjaṃ (ka0)} amatassa pattiyā, so yogakkhemassa pathassa kovido''ti..
[21] vappo ca vajjiputto ca, pakkho vimalakoṇḍañño.
[22] saṃsevitavuddhasīlinā {saṃsevitabuddhasīlinā (ka0)}, nibbānaṃ na hi tena dullabha''nti..
[21] ``yathā ^a^M0.0236^ea^ kaḷīro susu vaḍḍhitaggo, dunnikkhamo hoti pasākhajāto.
[22] evaṃ ahaṃ bhariyāyānitāya, anumaññaṃ ^a^T0.0277^ea^ maṃ pabbajitomhi dānī''ti..
[21] ``jiṇṇañca disvā dukhitañca byādhitaṃ, matañca disvā gatamāyusaṅkhayaṃ.
[22] tato ahaṃ nikkhamitūna pabbajiṃ, pahāya kāmāni manoramānī''ti..
[22] uddhaccaṃ vicikicchā ca, sabbasova na vijjatī''ti..
[21] ``sādhu suvihitāna dassanaṃ, kaṅkhā chijjati buddhi vaḍḍhati.
[22] bālampi karonti paṇḍitaṃ, tasmā sādhu sataṃ samāgamo''ti..
[21] ``idaṃ ^a^M0.0237^ea^ ^a^P0.0012^ea^ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ.
[22] tadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso, hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho''ti..
[21] ``sabbo rāgo pahīno me, sabbo doso samūhato.
[22] sabbo me vigato moho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto''ti..
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^M0.0238^ea^ mayā pakataṃ kammaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ.
[21] vacchapālo ca yo thero, ātumo māṇavo isi.
[27] suyāmano susārado, thero yo ca piyañjaho.
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^V0.0179^ea^ mayā pakataṃ pāpaṃ, pubbe aññāsu jātisu.
[22] idheva taṃ vedanīyaṃ, vatthu aññaṃ na vijjatī''ti..
[22] tena puttaka gacchassu, mā sokāpahato bhavā''ti..
[22] bhāvehi kusalaṃ dhammaṃ, jaha sīghaṃ samussaya''nti..
[22] jhāyaṃ nipako patissato, adhigaccheyya sukhaṃ nirāmisa''nti..
[21] ``ito ^a^V0.0180^ea^ bahiddhā puthu aññavādinaṃ, maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayaṃ.
[22] itissu saṅghaṃ bhagavānusāsati, satthā sayaṃ pāṇitaleva dassaya''nti..
[22] mutto oghā ca ganthā ca, sabbe mānā visaṃhatā''ti..
[27] nīto sunāgo nāgito, paviṭṭho ajjuno isi.
[22] devasabho ca yo thero, sāmidatto mahabbaloti..
[21] ``na ^a^V0.0181^ea^ tathā mataṃ satarasaṃ, sudhannaṃ yaṃ mayajja paribhuttaṃ.
[27] suññatā animitto ca, vimokkho yassa gocaro.
[21] ``dukkhā kāmā eraka, na sukhā kāmā eraka.
[27] yo kāme kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so kāmayati eraka.
[22] yo kāme na kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so na kāmayati erakā''ti..
[21] ``rūpaṃ ^a^T0.0282^ea^ ^a^M0.0241^ea^ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto.
[22] tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, bhavamūlopagāmino''ti {bhavamūlā bhavagāminoti (sī0 ka0)}..
[21] ``saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto.
[21] paripuṇṇako ca vijayo, erako mettajī muni.
[27] cakkhupālo khaṇḍasumano, tisso ca abhayo tathā.
[22] uttiyo ca mahāpañño, thero devasabhopi cāti..
[22] pitvā {pītvāna (sī0 syā0)} rasaggamuttamaṃ, na ca kāhāmi visena santhava''nti..
[21] ``lahuko vata me kāyo, phuṭṭho ca pītisukhena vipulena.
[22] tūlamiva eritaṃ mālutena, pilavatīva me kāyo''ti..
[22] tisso ^a^T0.0284^ea^ vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..
[22] tathāhayaṃ viharati pākatindriyo, migī yathā taruṇajātikā vane''ti..
[22] vivekakāmassa araññasaññino, janeti bhiyyo usabhassa kalyata''nti..
[21] ``duppabbajjaṃ ^a^M0.0244^ea^ ^a^V0.0185^ea^ ve duradhivāsā gehā, dhammo gambhīro duradhigamā bhogā.
[22] kicchā vutti no itarītareneva, yuttaṃ cintetuṃ satatamaniccata''nti..
[22] sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..
[22] tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṃ, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..
[21] ``abhisattova nipatati, vayo rūpaṃ aññamiva tatheva santaṃ.
[27] tasseva sato avippavasato, aññasseva sarāmi attāna''nti..
[27] jhāya gotama mā ca pamādo, kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī''ti..
[21] jento ^a^M0.0246^ea^ ca vacchagotto ca, vaccho ca vanasavhayo.
[21] ``natthi ^a^M0.0247^ea^ ^a^V0.0188^ea^ ^a^P0.0018^ea^ koci bhavo nicco, saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā.
[22] uppajjanti ca te khandhā, cavanti aparāparaṃ..
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā uttaro thero gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[22] āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo, iti disvāna carāmi esanaṃ..
[21] ``paṅkoti hi naṃ pavedayuṃ, yāyaṃ vandanapūjanā kulesu.
[22] sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho''ti..
[01] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo thero gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[21] ``tiṭṭha makkaṭa mā dhāvi, na hi te taṃ yathā pure.
[21] ``yo ^a^P0.0019^ea^ ca kho annapānassa, lābhī hotīdha puggalo.
[22] pāpadhammopi ce hoti, so nesaṃ hoti sakkato''ti..
[22] magge paṭipadāyaṃ vā, kaṅkhā mayhaṃ na vijjatī''ti..
[21] {dha0 pa0 13 dhammapade} ``yathā agāraṃ ducchannaṃ, vuṭṭhī samativijjhati.
[21] {dha0 pa0 14 dhammapade} ``yathā agāraṃ succhannaṃ, vuḍḍhī na samativijjhati.
[22] evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhatī''ti..
[21] ``sukhaṃ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhare.
[22] sadā ve rakkhitabbāsu, yāsu saccaṃ sudullabhaṃ..
[21] ``vadhaṃ carimha te kāma, anaṇā dāni te mayaṃ.
[22] gacchāma dāni nibbānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socatī''ti..
[21] ``pubbe ^a^T0.0290^ea^ hanati attānaṃ, pacchā hanati so pare.
[21] ``na brāhmaṇo bahivaṇṇo, anto vaṇṇo hi brāhmaṇo.
[22] yasmiṃ pāpāni kammāni, sa ve kaṇho sujampatī''ti..
[21] uttaro ceva piṇḍolo, valliyo tīriyo isi.
[27] ajino ca meḷajino, rādho surādho gotamo.
[22] vasabhena ime honti, dasa therā mahiddhikāti..
[22] paññāya atthaṃ jānāti, ñāto attho sukhāvaho..
[22] sace ratiṃ nādhigaccheyya tattha, saṅghe vase rakkhitatto satimā''ti..
[21] ``ye kho te veṭhamissena {veghamissena (sī0 syā0), ve gamissena, vekhamissena (ka0)}, nānattena ca kammunā.
[22] tepi ^a^T0.0291^ea^ tattheva kīranti, na hi kammaṃ panassati..
[21] ``yaṃ karoti naro kammaṃ, kalyāṇaṃ yadi pāpakaṃ.
[22] tassa tasseva dāyādo, yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pakubbatī''ti..
[21] ``atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhati.
[22] pacchāssa kaṭukaṃ hoti, vipāko hissa pāpako''ti..
[22] jano janena heṭhīyati, heṭheti ca {bodhiyati, bādheti ca (ka0)} jano janaṃ..
[21] ``ko ^a^P0.0021^ea^ hi tassa janenattho, janena janitena vā.
[22] janaṃ ohāya gacchaṃ taṃ, heṭhayitvā {bādhayitvā (ka0)} bahuṃ jana''nti..
[21] ``kāḷī ^a^T0.0292^ea^ itthī brahatī dhaṅkarūpā, satthiñca bhetvā aparañca satthiṃ.
[27] bāhañca bhetvā aparañca bāhaṃ, sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṃva.
[21] ``yo ve avidvā upadhiṃ karoti, punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mando.
[22] tasmā pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirā, māhaṃ puna bhinnasiro sayissa''nti {passissanti (ka0)}..
[22] lābhī annassa pānassa, vatthassa sayanassa ca..
[21] ``pare ca naṃ pasaṃsanti, attā ce asamāhito.
[22] moghaṃ pare pasaṃsanti, attā hi asamāhito..
[21] ``pare ca naṃ garahanti, attā ce susamāhito.
[22] moghaṃ pare garahanti, attā hi susamāhito''ti..
[21] cundo ^a^P0.0022^ea^ ca jotidāso ca, thero heraññakāni ca.
[27] somamitto sabbamitto, kālo tisso ca kimilo {kimbilo (sī0 syā0 pī0), chandalakkhaṇānulomaṃ}.
[22] nando ca sirimā ceva, dasa therā mahiddhikāti..
[22] bhāvitā mama bojjhaṅgā, patto me āsavakkhayo..
[21] ``panādo nāma so rājā, yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayo.
[22] tiriyaṃ soḷasubbedho {soḷasapabbedho (sī0 aṭṭha0), soḷasabbāṇo (?)}, ubbhamāhu {uddhamāhu (sī0), uccamāhu (syā0)} sahassadhā..
[22] karissaṃ nāvarajjhissaṃ {nāvarujjhissaṃ (ka0 sī0 ka0)}, passa vīriyaṃ parakkama..
[22] sabbe coḷā samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti..
[22] ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, tuccho kāyo adissathā''ti..
[22] bhiyyo laddāna saṃvegaṃ, adīno vahate dhuraṃ..
[22] ājānīyaṃ maṃ dhāretha, puttaṃ buddhassa orasa''nti..
[21] ``satthā ca pariciṇṇo me, dhammo saṅgho ca pūjito.
[22] ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṃ disvā anāsava''nti..
[21] ``bhavarāgahatassa me sato, bhavarāgo puna me na vijjati.
[22] na cāhu na ca me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatī''ti..
[27] vītasoko ca yo thero, puṇṇamāso ca nandako.
[22] gahakāraṃ {gahakārakaṃ (sī0 pī0)} gavesanto, dukkhā jāti punappunaṃ..
[27] sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, thūṇikā {thūṇirā (pī0 ka0), dhuṇirā (syā0)} ca vidālitā {padālitā (sī0 syā0)}.
[22] sace uṇhodakaṃ atthi, munino dehi brāhmaṇa..
[21] ``diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānā.
[22] sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhā..
[21] ``addhā na jānanti yatodha dhammaṃ, kāmā ^a^T0.0298^ea^ aniccā iti cāpi āhu.
[22] rāgañca tesaṃ na balatthi chettuṃ, tasmā sitā puttadāraṃ dhanañcā''ti..
